item.title: 10-year Treasury yield hovers above 4.3% as investors focus on the Fed's rate decision
item.description: The benchmark 10-year Treasury yield was flat on Friday as investors look ahead to the Federal Reserve's final meeting of the year.

item.title: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi hospitalized after injury in Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was hospitalized after sustaining an injury while traveling with a congressional delegation in Luxembourg.

item.title: Federal Reserve is likely to cut interest rates next week. Here's what that means for you
item.description: The third interest rate cut in a row is on deck, which is welcome news for consumers struggling to keep up with sky-high interest charges.

item.title: Tech investor Dan Niles is the least interested in the 'Magnificent 7' he's been in years
item.description: The founder of Niles Investment Management expects an "AI digestion phase" in 2025.

item.title: Elon Musk reveals SEC sent him 'settlement demand' after Twitter buyout probe
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a "settlement demand" to Elon Musk, the tech billionaire revealed in a social media post on Thu...
